title: ALPHA WOLF Announces Headlining Dates
description: Specifically six of 'em. The post ALPHA WOLF Announces Headlining Dates appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 9 hours ago
text: Alpha Wolf has announced a handful of solo U.S. headlining dates around their upcoming Summer Of Loud tour with Beartooth, I Prevail, Killswitch Engage, and Parkway Drive. Get those dates below. Tickets are available here. 6/25 Memphis, TN 18846/30 Albuquerque, NM Launchpad7/3 Fresno, CA Strummers7/10 Des Moines, IA XBK7/21 Albany, NY Empire Underground7/25 Richmond, VA Canal Club Beartooth, I Prevail, Killswitch Engage, and Parkway Drive will hit the road this June and July alongside openers The Devil Wears Prada, The Amity Affliction and Alpha Wolf. TX2 will open June 22 through July 2; Kingdom of Giants will open July 5 through July 15; and Dark Divine will serve as openers from July 16 through July 27. Tickets are available here. The tour kicks off June 21 in West Palm Beach, FL and winds through North America before wrapping on July 27 in Charlotte, NC. In addition, the tour will be donating $1 from each ticket sold to Living The Dream Foundation, non-profit foundation that helps children and young adults living with life-threatening illnesses stay positive, maintain hope, and appreciate every day, regardless of their affliction. 6/21 West Palm Beach, FL iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre6/22 Tampa, FL MIDFLORIDA Credit Union Amphitheatre6/24 Atlanta, GA Lakewood Amphitheatre6/26 Dallas, TX Dos Equis Pavillion6/27 Austin, TX Germania Insurance Amphitheater6/28 Houston, TX _ The Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion7/1 Phoenix, AZ Talking Stick Resort Amphitheatre7/2 San Diego, CA Gallagher Square at Petco Park7/5 Irvine, CA Great Park Live7/6 Concord, CA Toyota Pavilion at Concord7/8 Salt Lake City, UT Utah First Credit Union Amphitheatre7/9 Denver, CO The JunkYard7/11 Somerset, WI Somerset Amphitheater7/12 Green Bay, WI Capital Credit Union Park7/13 Tinley Park, IL Credit Union 1 Amphitheatre7/15 Toronto, ON Budweiser Stage7/16 Clarkston, MI Pine Knob Music Theatre7/18 Mansfield, OH Inkcarceration7/19 York, PA York State Fair7/20 Wantagh, NY Northwell at Jones Beach Theater7/22 Mansfield, MA Xfinity Center7/23 Camden, NJ Freedom Mortgage Pavilion7/24 Holmdel, NJ PNC Bank Arts Center7/26 Bristow, VA Jiffy Lube Live7/27 Charlotte, NC PNC Music Pavilion Want More Metal? html:
Alpha Wolf has announced a handful of solo U.S. headlining dates around their upcoming Summer Of Loud tour with Beartooth, I Prevail, Killswitch Engage, and Parkway Drive. Get those dates below. Tickets are available here.

6/25 Memphis, TN 1884
6/30 Albuquerque, NM Launchpad
7/3 Fresno, CA Strummers
7/10 Des Moines, IA XBK
7/21 Albany, NY Empire Underground
7/25 Richmond, VA Canal Club

Beartooth, I Prevail, Killswitch Engage, and Parkway Drive will hit the road this June and July alongside openers The Devil Wears Prada, The Amity Affliction and Alpha Wolf. TX2 will open June 22 through July 2; Kingdom of Giants will open July 5 through July 15; and Dark Divine will serve as openers from July 16 through July 27. Tickets are available here.

The tour kicks off June 21 in West Palm Beach, FL and winds through North America before wrapping on July 27 in Charlotte, NC. In addition, the tour will be donating $1 from each ticket sold to Living The Dream Foundation, non-profit foundation that helps children and young adults living with life-threatening illnesses stay positive, maintain hope, and appreciate every day, regardless of their affliction.

6/21 West Palm Beach, FL iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre
6/22 Tampa, FL MIDFLORIDA Credit Union Amphitheatre
